TextView.android:text:
This app contains a list of useful apps for MQTT. 

The first app is MQTT Tool. 
This allows the app to publish and subscribe to MQTT events indpendently on any of the MQTT servers that it can reach via the internet.
 
The second app is IOT Devices Search in the local WiFi Network. Devices are searched using 3 methods: a) Ping (b) TCP:80 (c) SSH:22
